title: He’s Got A Weak Mind And Other Things
itunes:title: He’s Got A Weak Mind And Other Things
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been with my man for about 5 years and he is a nice, kind hearted, Christian gentleman. We met at a work convention and he told me that he was divorced. That is all we have in common. It took me a few years to notice how he’s clingy and soft. I hate to call a man weak but he has no backbone when it comes to putting someone in their place, including me................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
